name: Speed Run (AustinEckstein)
description:
Title: Name of Game

Platform: PC 

GameGenre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Try to get to the end of the map without the golem killing you. Game starts after the first tutorial is completed.

Instructions: WASD is move and space is jump.

Game Design Austin Eckstein Game Designer
